Rating:

posts.post_content:
The fact that this is common makes Boros super tasty for limited.  
Also, expect this to see significant play if R/W aggro is viable. There's no other aggro two drop in the same league except [Ash Zealot](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ash Zealot), so this can definitely replace [Gore-house Chainwalker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gore-house Chainwalker).
